snippet: In a meeting in the Oval Office on Thursday, President Obama told Antonis Samaras, the Greek prime minister, that policies focused only on spending reductions would not help Greece return to economic prosperity.
abstract: In a meeting in the Oval Office on Thursday, President Obama told Antonis Samaras, the Greek prime minister, that policies focused only on spending reductions would not help Greece return to economic prosperity.

headline.main: Obama Urges Greece to Grow Its Economy
